platform.summary: Systems biology tools implemented by the Sybila team.
comments: All tools can be found on [GitHub](https://github.com/sybila/).
citations: Demko, M., Chrást, L., Dvořák, P., Damborský, J., & Šafránek, D. (2019). [Computational Modelling of Metabolic Burden and Substrate Toxicity in Escherichia coli Carrying a Synthetic Metabolic Pathway](https://doi.org/10.3390/microorganisms7110553). *Microorganisms*, 7(11), 553. doi: 10.3390/microorganisms7110553

Troják, M., Šafránek, D., Mertová, L., & Brim, L. (2020). [eBCSgen: A Software Tool for Biochemical Space Language](https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-030-60327-4_20). In A. Abate, T. Petrov, & V. Wolf (Eds.), Computational Methods in Systems Biology (pp. 356–361). Springer International Publishing. doi: 10.1007/978-3-030-60327-4_20
sponsors: The [Systems Biology Research Centre (Sybila)](https://sybila.fi.muni.cz/) located at the [Faculty of Informatics of Masaryk University](https://www.fi.muni.cz/index.html.en) in Brno, Czechia
